Articles.Content:
http://spacedock.info/mod/256/Avalon%20Astronautics%20High%20Tech%20Parts

My first mod ever!!!! I recently updated it to add 2 parts instead of 1!!!

The description on the mod's page shows what it adds so check that out.

If you have any issues/suggestions/advice please feel free to PM me.

As you can tell by the stock models & lack of textures, I have no experience in making either of those, so I am looking for people who are willing to do that.
What does the nacelle do? I couldn't tell from the description

26 minutes ago, akron said:

What does the nacelle do? I couldn't tell from the description

The nacelle converts oxidizer to intake air, this (in theory) should allow air-breathing engines to work at extremely high altitudes with much more power, maybe even space!!!!

Also, Are those flags/banners ones you designed? If so, would you be willing to make me a flag for the mod (I'd give credit) &/or Spacedock banner (I'd also give credit)? Because they look awesome!!!!

-KspNerd

1 hour ago, KSPNerd said:

The nacelle converts oxidizer to intake air, this (in theory) should allow air-breathing engines to work at extremely high altitudes with much more power, maybe even space!!!!

Also, Are those flags/banners ones you designed? If so, would you be willing to make me a flag for the mod (I'd give credit) &/or Spacedock banner (I'd also give credit)? Because they look awesome!!!!

-KspNerd

Thanks, I'll send you a PM
